Data

Class SerializeDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.SerializeDB

  • public class SerializeDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Serialization method. This class serialize the entity to be written as an object into a text file. Note : When structure of the Object type (the class file) in the list changed the Serialized file may fail.
    Since:
    24th October 2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Low See Rong

      This function retrieves and increment the serialized unique ID number from a text file and writes it back into the file.

    • Method Detail

      • readSerializedObject

        public static java.util.List readSerializedObject(java.lang.String filename)
        This function reads from a text file where a list of serialized objects is stored.
        Parameters:
        filename - - A file name where the list of serialized objects is stored.
        Returns:
        A list of deserialize objects

      • writeSerializedObject

        public static void writeSerializedObject(java.lang.String filename,
                         java.util.List list)
        This function writes a list of objects into a text file using serialization.
        Parameters:
        filename - - A file name where the list of objects is to be stored.
        list - - A list of objects to be written into the text file using serialization.

      • readSerializedRunningID

        public static int readSerializedRunningID(java.lang.String filename)
        This function reads from a text file where an serialize unique ID is stored
        Parameters:
        filename - - A file name where the unique ID is stored.
        Returns:
        An ID number.

      • writeSerializedRunningID

        public static void writeSerializedRunningID(java.lang.String filename,
                            int runningID)
        This function writes a unique ID into a text file using serialization.
        Parameters:
        filename - - A file name where the unique ID is to be stored.
        runningID - - An ID number.

      • incrementAndGetRunningID

        public static int incrementAndGetRunningID(java.lang.String filename)
        This function retrieves and increment the serialized unique ID number from a text file and writes it back into the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - - A file name where the unique ID is stored.
        Returns:
        An ID number.
